quote: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That is how they define 'reality.'
Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world.
A lesson without pain is meaningless, that’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.
We have to live a life of no regrets.
The weak don’t get to decide anything, not even how they die.
Fools who don’t respect the past are doomed to repeat it.
The only thing we’re allowed to do is to believe that we won’t regret the choice we made.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.
Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this accursed world.
It’s human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life’s greatest lessons are learned through pain.
The longer you live… The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness.
When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
I’m not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That is my nindo: my ninja way!
A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one.
People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That is how they define “reality”. But what does it mean to be “correct” or “true”?
Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training.
A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
Hard work is a talent in itself.
How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
A lesson without pain is meaningless. For you cannot gain something without sacrificing something else in return.
There's no such thing as a painless lesson. They just don't exist. Sacrifices are necessary.
Humans are not perfect. We call our mistakes 'sin'. But it is our flaws that make us human.
A heart made fullmetal.
Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have.
If you lift your head up high, the tears won't fall down.
What is fear? Not being able to see the future? Or is it perhaps, being able to see it?
When you have something you want to protect, that's when you can become truly strong.
If fate is a millstone, then we are the grist. There is nothing we can do. So I wish for strength.
We are all like fireworks: we climb, we shine and always go our separate ways and become further apart.
The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
You said you didn't know where to go? I always thought that... the place you belong is always right by the side of the person you love.
You can't sit around envying other people's worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed!
I'm not a king, nor a god. I'm something much worse.
In this world, evil can arise from the best of intentions. And there is good which can come from evil intentions.
It's not the world that's imperfect. It is we who are imperfect.
If the king doesn't move, then his subjects won't follow.
The world is not beautiful, therefore it is.
Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
We don't have to know what tomorrow holds! That's why we can live for everything we're worth today!
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
Go beyond! Plus Ultra!
It's fine now. Why? Because I am here!
A hero can be anyone. Even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as putting a coat around a young boy's shoulders to let him know that the world hadn't ended.
The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
A heart made fullmetal.
I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
The power of science is amazing!
Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
anime: Various (often misattributed, but a core theme in many)

quote: I want to be the very best, like no one ever was.
Reject common sense to make the impossible possible.
Don't believe in yourself. Believe in me! Believe in the Kamina who believes in you!
Your drill is the drill that will pierce the heavens!
Who the hell do you think I am?!
We evolve beyond the person that we were a minute before. Little by little, we advance with each turn. That's how a drill works!
I'm so fucked up.
The fate of destruction is also the joy of rebirth.
Anywhere can be paradise as long as you have the will to live.
People cannot gain anything without sacrificing something. You must present something of equal value in order to gain something. That is the principle of equivalent exchange in alchemy.

It's a terrible thing to be alone. It's so scary. To have no one to love you... that's just terrifying.
